Some of the teams in my large corporation are struggling with working  
wit=
h parallel streams to the extent that they hold each project up  
because t=
hey don't want to change the same code as each other. When  
pushed it's be=
cause they don't understand or have never used the

com> wrote:

nt for

 never seen it. The fact that one can get through a CS degree too

ut using version control is less surprising, but still
